LanguageData.TD.GearAndGoDesc: Draft, get gear for current outfit, then go to the targeted location
LanguageData.TD.SettingBetterPawnControlPolicy: If you're using Better Pawn Control, set this policy when you click the button:
LanguageData.TD.SettingBetterPawnControlRemembered: The last policy is remembered, so right-clicking the button will reset and undraft
